original_text:
Long may he live;
    may gold of Sheba be given to him!
May prayer be made for him continually,
    and blessings invoked for him all the day!
korean_text: 그들이 생존하여 스바의 금을 그에게 드리며 사람들이 그를 위하여 항상 기도하고 종일 찬송하리로다

sentences.original_text: may gold of Sheba be given to him
May prayer be made for him continually
and blessings invoked for him all the day
